meta_description: Technologies to measure gaze direction and pupil reactivity have become efficient, cheap, and compact and are finding increasing use in many fields, including gaming, marketing, driver safety,...
meta_title: What Does Your Gaze Reveal About You? On the Privacy Implications of Eye Tracking | Springer for Research & Development
title: Researchers find that eye-tracking can reveal people's sex, age, ethnicity, personality traits, drug-consumption habits, emotions, fears, skills, interests, sexual preferences, and physical and mental health. [March 2020]

body: I'm a pretty skeptical of this, especially with regards to personality. There's simply too much variability, and that's just for the physical traits.
body_html: I'm a pretty skeptical of this, especially with regards to personality. There's simply too much variability, and that's just for the physical traits.

author.bio: Just a guy on the internet who's avatar is a giant mutant crocodile. In my spare time I make wooden things, 3D artwork and work on my tabletop RPG, Destructive Tendencies.

body:
Can't access 

Do they mean simply motion tracking or does this include iris scanning, eyelids and all that, because I can see a lot of data coming from that, but from simple "eye tracking" I don't see how they could possibly extrapolate all of that.
body_html:
Can't access

Do they mean simply motion tracking or does this include iris scanning, eyelids and all that, because I can see a lot of data coming from that, but from simple "eye tracking" I don't see how they could possibly extrapolate all of that.
